item.title: About Me
item.description:
👨‍💻 About Me

Hello and welcome!

I’m a Computer Engineer with a passion for teaching and knowledge sharing.
Over the years, I’ve helped students and professionals grow their skills in computer science, engineering, and academic subjects.
My goal is simple: make complex topics clear, practical, and accessible — whether you’re preparing for exams, starting a new project, or simply curious to learn.

🎯 What I Offereeed

💻 Computer Science & IT Coaching

  • Programming & application: Python, C, C#, C++
  • Web development: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Hugo
  • Databases: SQL
  • Tools & automation: Git, CI/CD, Make, Excel, VBA
  • Fundamentals: computer basics, algorithms, and project support

Learn the essentials, strengthen your coding skills, or get guidance on your personal/academic projects.

item.title: Diamidex
item.description: Mission d’ingénieur Python au sein de Diamidex pendant 12 mois, centrée sur le développement de services backend, l’automatisation des flux de données et l’amélioration continue des processus internes.
